meta.desc: If a backlight device is available, this extension shows a brightness indicator on panel menu, that allows changing brightness through scrolling on it. Useful, when using ddcci-driver-linux on a desktop PC without native keyboard buttons to change brightness.
meta.desc_long: If a backlight device is available, this extension shows a brightness indicator on panel menu, that allows changing brightness through scrolling on it. Useful, when using ddcci-driver-linux on a desktop PC without native keyboard buttons to change brightness.
